name: Dream Survey
description:
For best results: Volume up! And be as descriptive as possible in your answer :)

Made for MsPaintJam 2020 in 7 days. There are 20 different endings (all of them the same result, just different flavor text and a few more spooks.)

This is based off a real events, and I do not actually collect your dream recordings. (Feel free to share if you wish though :D)

There are typos. I'll fix them later. Maybe.
